import{useMemo}from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import useCurrentBlockTimestamp from'./useCurrentBlockTimestamp';// combines the block timestamp with the user setting to give the deadline that should be used for any submitted transaction
export default function useTransactionDeadline(){const ttl=useSelector(state=>state.user.userDeadline);const blockTimestamp=useCurrentBlockTimestamp();return useMemo(()=>{if(blockTimestamp&&ttl)return blockTimestamp.add(ttl);return undefined;},[blockTimestamp,ttl]);}
